# TypeRacer Hide Other Players ğŸï¸

**Get rid of distractions while racing on TypeRacer!** This userscript allows you to focus solely on your own typing by removing the visual clutter of other players.

## ğŸ”§ Installation

1. **Install a Userscript Manager:**
   - [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/)
   - [Violentmonkey](https://violentmonkey.github.io/)

2. **Install the Userscript:**
   - **Preferred Method (GitHub):** Click **[this link](../../raw/main/dist/typeracer-hide-other-players.user.js)** to get the latest version directly from GitHub.

   - You can also find the script on:

      <a href="https://greasyfork.org/en/scripts/123456-typeracer-hide-other-players">
         <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-greasyfork-950000?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64," alt="Install on GreasyFork">
      </a>
      <a href="https://openuserjs.org/scripts/YourUsername/TypeRacer_Hide_Other_Players">
         <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/-openuserjs-2C3E50?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/png;base64,  " alt="Install on OpenUserJS">
      </a>

3. **Reload TypeRacer:**
   - Navigate to [TypeRacer](https://play.typeracer.com/) and start a new race.

## ğŸ“š Usage

Once installed, the userscript will automatically hide all other players on the TypeRacer scoreboard, displaying only your progress.
